column4: anyone here have DRI up and running on the ATI X700? it seems to be a troubled card for many using the restricted drivers..
ati have always been troublesome as far as linux goes... nasty drivers
yes they have been troublesome for years. there was a year or so i didn' t have much in the way of woes with my 9700.
yeah my towers 9250 worked great with aiglx an all
